title: War of the Roses: Why Was He Dunking His Shirt in the Toilet?
description: Sara recently found out that a friend of hers didn't come to her wedding because her friend heard Sara's husband Bradley was cheating on her.  Now Sara has been catching Bradley doing weird things after his "runs" so she's wondering if he had cheated in the past, is currently cheating, or both.
itunes:summary: Sara recently found out that a friend of hers didn't come to her wedding because her friend heard Sara's husband Bradley was cheating on her.  Now Sara has been catching Bradley doing weird things after his "runs" so she's wondering if he had cheated in the past, is currently cheating, or both.
